message: Let's start fair. I take a slight majority, but you get a good chunk too.
Let's try a different split, slightly in my favor this time.
Okay, I see your point. Let's try 5500 for me, 4500 for you.  Close to your last offer, but still a bit more for me.
Getting a bit impatient, let's try to meet in the middle, but still a bit more for me.
